articles.description: League bosses say the move is designed to "distance" the sport from Harry Potter author JK Rowling.
articles.content:
By Manish PandeyNewsbeat reporter
Quidditch has changed its name to Quadball in a move designed to "distance" it from Harry Potter author JK Rowling.
A fictional version of the sport, played on fly… [+3957 chars]

articles.title: Jamie T: The Theory of Whatever review – a triumph from an indie-rock survivor - The Guardian
articles.description: Still a sparky and singular talent, the diverse styles on the singer-songwriter’s fifth album are bonded with grit
